Name: 作业本战记（exercise book epic）
About the game: Caution：This game is only in simplified Chinese. I'm sorry for this game is not supporting English.But once sales are growing,I will retain a professional translation for the game. This is a SLG game on an exercise book with fantasy characters and formidable enemies。 This game content: 9 controllable characters. 23 levels and 1 extra level. 1 exercise book. Use your courage and tactics to defeat evil enemies just like an desktop RPG. May one day this game can been translated into English.
